item.title: What Nobody Tells You About Documentation Review
item.description: From the video: Documentation isn’t just one thing. It’s four: Tutorials How-To Guides Discussions Reference Documentation needs to be expliciltly structured around one of the four categories Folks need each type at different times They need to be kept distinct Tutorials: Learning oriented Detailed walk-thrus to complete a project Targted at beginners Show them how to acheive something meaningful Hardest part to create and maintain Tutorials - What Matters:
